Room.Name: Niobe's Practice Chamber
Room.ShortDescription: You are in Niobe's acoustically perfect practice chamber.
Room.LongDescription: An entire orchestra is here, tuning their instruments and adjusting the heights of the music stands in front of them. The men are in tuxedos, and the women are in formal black gowns. They await the meistro to rap for their attention. The sweet sounds of an oboe and flute in duet float across the room. There are but three empty but comfortable chairs for the audience, and the members of the orchestra know this will be a command performance tonight.
